author: potuz
content:
<@636289909359116290> 
> Might want to make an announcement on the ethereum Twitter warning about the hack that’s sweeping most crypto sites

What is this?

author: kommstar
content: I saw some concern out there that some ad was serving javascript which was creating a popup asking for seed phrases

author: chris2_2_2
content: Etherscan spiritswap quickswap coingecko and others got hacked https://www.reddit.com/r/CryptoCurrency/comments/up2mna/emergency_security_warning_multiple_sites/

author: pietjepuk
content: Hacked seems, excessive? Sounds more like scammy ad injection

author: chris2_2_2
content: Apparently they created a fake version of each website. Seems like a higher level than most.

author: pietjepuk
content: That's even less of a hack then. Nothing new imo

author: chris2_2_2
content: At the same url and if you swap you lose your funds

author: potuz
content: How the hell at the same url? Did they hijack the dns resolver of the victims?

author: chris2_2_2
content: Apparently hacked the go daddy accounts which is why this is so scary.

author: potuz
content: Those sites were hosted by GoDaddy and vulnerable?, this is just too bizarre

author: 0xaren
content: Haven't seen anything about hacked go daddy accounts. Only this https://twitter.com/etherscan/status/1525358941625929729

author: chris2_2_2
content: To my knowledge quick swap doesn’t have banners so that might not explain everything.

author: 0xaren
content: Ahh okay. I see there were two different hacks. https://twitter.com/techleadhd/status/1525363094079254528

author: chris2_2_2
content: Yeah scary stuff which is why I suggested the ethereum Twitter post it

author: xinbenlv
content: If i wanna start a discord channel for EIP5081 research and implementation workgroup in this ETH R&D server, what is the best way?

author: protolambda
content: <@474796222738202636> there's a <#779922457631916064> channel that's inactive but that seems relevant enough to use. If conversation is active I can create a dedicated channel for the EIP. That said, please also use ethereum-magicians for more long-form conversation about the EIP.
